metadata.name: Little Angel
metadata.description:
Now I know that hell on earth exists.
And this is absolutely true. He is in Ukraine!
Have you ever fallen asleep with the thought that you would never wake up? What about every night? Did you think about death every minute?
I no longer think about it. The fear of death is gone.
But most of all I worry about the children.

Children are the most important thing in our life. I think many will agree with me. Especially those who already have children.

My biggest fear is for my daughter. For all the little children of Ukraine. After all, they do not even know the words - "politics, war and genocide." But some of them already know what death is.
